name: Frontline Survivors
description:
Frontline Survivors is an intense top-down shooter with roguelite elements that puts you in the boots of a soldier fighting for survival on the battlefield. With countless enemies coming at you from all sides, you will need to use all your skills and strategy to stay alive.



As you progress through the game, you'll have the opportunity to level up and choose upgrades that can improve your weapon efficiency as well as give you a range of special abilities. Whether you want to focus on skills and speed, or go in guns blazing, there are plenty of options to suit your playstyle.

With immersive gameplay, challenging enemies, and a range of customizations to unlock, Frontline Survivors is a must-play for any fan of top-down shooters.

Are you ready to join the fight and emerge as a survivor on the frontlines?

Key features

  • Capture camps and destroy objectives to conquer the battlefield
  • Command allies to help you beat the enemy
  • Upgrade your character in various ways
  • Multiple characters to choose from with their own skills and gameplay
  • Unlock new weapons to obliterate your enemies
